snippet.title: PC Longplay Kings Quest V: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Marlene55M

As recommended by one of the cubex55 admins, I cut all the saving screens except for the one near the Yeti cave. Also, I cut about 5 minutes (!) near the end, waiting for Mordack to appear in his bedroom.... geez! :-)
King's Quest V has always been one of my favorite Sierra games despite the many death traps and the second most annoying and useless helper in game history, Cedric. Let's help King Graham to find his family that has been kidnapped by the evil sorcerer Mordack.
The King's Quest Series was developed by Roberta Williams. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
